description: The QUERY_INSTRUCTIONS table contains information about the query instructions for query records (records in the QRY master file).

columns.name: QUERY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the query record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RESOLV_INSTRUCTIONS
columns.description: Instructions for how to resolve the query.
